Text: Oops, sorry for the bad keyword - there's no commentary here.

tr108, your uploads look promising. Since HR is on a break, your files could be perfect for me (being an Apple fanboy like yourself), as I've been using YIFY recently instead. 

How do your files compare to HR's quality?

Thanks for the interest, BlueTak.

Not sure how to compare myself to HR except to say that I believe in smaller file sizes - and, by extension, lower bit rates - than he does. When I encode,  I believe in trimming all the fat - in other words, adjusting the bit rate to suit the material -  because a smaller file is always better.

I'm hesitant to compare visual quality on a numbers scale vs. what HR does, but I think my encodes are serviceable. :)

I love your torrent tr108. I love about subtitle, others don't have it, most of them. Because, I have iPhone 4, so I can watch on the phone with subtitle on it. Love it, man. Thanks a lot. Hope you load more movies.

Thanks for the love, TomKowl. Subs are pretty important to me too, as I often watch late at night with the sound turned way down.

I'll try to throw up some movies when I can. Won't be a lot for the next few months, but 1 or 2 a week... hopefully. :)
